Articles.Content:
So I just download ksp 1.0 extract everything I start up the patcher. I wait for it to load then i scroll down to authentication. Its say "getting login token". then in red its says" unable to authenticate with the server: recived malformed data from server File not found"

What should I do?

Plz answer ASAP
